special_auto_loader.name: Auto loader
special_auto_loader.description: An experimental upgrade that automatically reloads the weapon, even when firing.

special_concordant_sequence.name: Concordant sequence
special_concordant_sequence.description: A modification that causes weapon strikes to temporarily enhance the regeneration rate of a wingman's shield, at the cost of increased heat generation.

special_corrosive_shell.name: Corrosive shell
special_corrosive_shell.description: Experimental rounds that temporarily weaken hull hardness and increase all damage taken, at the cost of reduced ammo capacity.

special_blinding_shell.name: Dazzle shell
special_blinding_shell.description: Experimental shells that temporarily reduce a target's sensor acuity upon impact.

special_dispersal_field.name: Dispersal field
special_dispersal_field.description: Experimental upgrade that causes successful strikes to temporarily confuse all gimbal and turret hardpoints on the target, at the cost of direct damage potential.

special_drag_munitions.name: Drag munitions
special_drag_munitions.description: Experimental munitions that disrupt engine exhaust flow on the target, temporarily preventing ENG power distribution from increasing thrust.

special_emissive_munitions.name: Emissive munitions
special_emissive_munitions.description: Experimental upgrade that causes strikes to envelope the target in energetic particles, significantly amplifying its signature, at the cost of increasing heat generation for the attacker.

special_feedback_cascade.name: Feedback cascade (Legacy)
special_feedback_cascade.description: Rail slug energy charging mechanism, designed to interfere with shield cell operation. Strikes to a target deploying a shield cell will damage the shield cell bank and reduce shield restoration, at the cost of reduced damage from smaller rounds.

special_force_shell.name: Force shell
special_force_shell.description: A modification to allow firing of low explosive shells, designed to generate a propelling blast. Strikes to a target are capable of forcing ships off course, at the cost of shot accuracy.

special_fsd_interrupt.name: FSD interrupt
special_fsd_interrupt.description: Experimental munitions that cause the frame shift drive on the impacted ship to reboot, at the cost of reduced damage.

special_high_yield_shell.name: High yield shell
special_high_yield_shell.description: Modified munitions that convert a portion of damage to explosive, capable of hitting multiple internal modules if the attack breaches the hull, at the cost of a reduced fire rate.

special_incendiary_rounds.name: Incendiary rounds
special_incendiary_rounds.description: Modified ammo system capable of delivering superheated rounds, increasing damage and converting a large portion to thermal.

special_inertial_impact.name: Inertial impact
special_inertial_impact.description: Experimental upgrade that increases damage and converts half of it to kinetic, at the cost of introducing aiming jitter.

special_ion_disruptor.name: Ion disruptor
special_ion_disruptor.description: Experimental munitions capable of disrupting a target's drives, causing them to reboot.

special_mass_lock_munition.name: Mass lock munition
special_mass_lock_munition.description: Experimental warheads incorporating frame shift technology. Successful detonation significantly inhibits charging for supercruise.

special_overload_munitions.name: Overload munitions
special_overload_munitions.description: Experimental munitions that convert a portion of explosive damage to thermal.

special_penetrator_payload.name: Penetrator payload
special_penetrator_payload.description: Deep cut munitions are guaranteed to penetrate upon impact with hull and are capable of damaging multiple internal modules.

special_phasing_sequence.name: Phasing sequence
special_phasing_sequence.description: Modulating burst fire system designed to defeat shielding. A small amount of damage is able to bleed through shields and attack the target's hull directly, at the cost of minor damage reduction.

special_plasma_slug.name: Plasma slug (Legacy)
special_plasma_slug.description: Experimental upgrade allowing plasma slug ammo to be generated directly from ship fuel, at the cost of reduced damage.

special_radiant_canister.name: Radiant Canister
special_radiant_canister.description: Experimental munitions that apply significant heat to all targets caught in the blast radius. In addition, targets' sensors are temporarily disrupted, at the cost of ammo capacity.

special_regeneration_sequence.name: Regeneration sequence
special_regeneration_sequence.description: Friend or Foe Beam modulation upgrade. When the beam strikes a wingman's shields its energy is regulated, regenerating the shield instead of damaging it.

special_reverberating_cascade.name: Reverberating cascade
special_reverberating_cascade.description: Experimental munitions that overload shields on impact, directly damaging the shield generator.

special_scramble_spectrum.name: Scramble spectrum
special_scramble_spectrum.description: Experimental upgrade that allows hull strikes to potentially trigger random malfunctions on the target.

special_screening_shell.name: Screening shell
special_screening_shell.description: Modified firing and targeting mechanism, decreasing reload times and increasing effectiveness against munitions.

special_shiftlock_canister.name: Shift-lock canister
special_shiftlock_canister.description: Experimental munitions that cause all frame shift drives caught in the blast radius to reboot, at the cost of reduced damage.

special_smart_rounds.name: Smart rounds
special_smart_rounds.description: Friend or foe targeting upgrade that causes rounds to self-destruct before damaging ships that are not currently targeted.

special_super_penetrator.name: Super penetrator (Legacy)
special_super_penetrator.description: Experimental munitions that are capable of penetrating and damaging all modules along its trajectory, at the cost of increased reload times.

special_lock_breaker.name: Target lock breaker
special_lock_breaker.description: Experimental upgrade that breaks target lock on successful strikes.

special_thermal_cascade.name: Thermal cascade
special_thermal_cascade.description: Experimental munitions that interact with shields upon detonation, generating significant heat on the target.

special_thermal_conduit.name: Thermal conduit
special_thermal_conduit.description: Experimental upgrade that increases damage output based on heat level of the firing ship.

special_thermal_vent.name: Thermal vent
special_thermal_vent.description: Experimental upgrade that increases heat dissipation when successfully striking a target, at the cost of increased heat generation when missing.

special_thermalshock.name: Thermal shock
special_thermalshock.description: Articulated focus array designed to spread heat effectively. Strikes to shields and hull impart additional heat into the target.

special_feedback_cascade_cooled.name: Feedback Cascade
special_feedback_cascade_cooled.description: Rail slug energy charging mechanism, designed to interfere with shield cell operation. Strikes to a target deploying a shield cell will damage the shield cell bank and reduce shield restoration, at the cost of reduced damage from smaller rounds.

special_super_penetrator_cooled.name: Super Penetrator
special_super_penetrator_cooled.description: Experimental munitions that are capable of penetrating and damaging all modules along its trajectory, at the cost of increased reload times.

special_plasma_slug_cooled.name: Plasma Slug
special_plasma_slug_cooled.description: Experimental upgrade allowing plasma slug ammo to be generated directly from ship fuel, at the cost of reduced damage.

special_plasma_slug_pa.name: Plasma Slug
special_plasma_slug_pa.description: Experimental upgrade allowing plasma slug ammo to be generated directly from ship fuel, at the cost of reduced damage.

special_penetrator_munitions.name: Penetrator Munitions
special_penetrator_munitions.description: Experimental munitions capable of penetrating hull to damage internal modules.

special_deep_cut_payload.name: Penetrator Payload
special_deep_cut_payload.description: Deep cut munitions are guaranteed to penetrate upon impact with hull and are capable of damaging multiple internal modules.

special_mass_lock.name: Mass Lock Munition
special_mass_lock.description: Experimental warheads incorporating frame shift technology. Successful detonation significantly inhibits charging for supercruise.

special_shield_regenerative.name: Fast Charge
special_shield_regenerative.description: High speed charging units increase shield regeneration rate when active and reforming, at the cost of slightly weaker resistance versus all forms of damage.

special_shield_resistive.name: Multi-weave
special_shield_resistive.description: Reinforced shield weave structures increase resistance versus all types of damage, at the cost of increased power draw and SYS drain.

special_shield_health.name: Hi-Cap
special_shield_health.description: Additional capacitors and projection nodes increase maximum shield strength, at the cost of increased power draw and SYS drain.

special_shield_efficient.name: Lo-draw
special_shield_efficient.description: Lightweight component swaps and smaller charging units reduce power draw and SYS drain, at the cost of overall shield effectiveness.

special_shield_thermic.name: Thermo Block
special_shield_thermic.description: Improved feedback protection and reinforced projection nodes increase resistance to thermal damage, at the cost of overall shield strength.

special_shield_kinetic.name: Force Block
special_shield_kinetic.description: Enlarged projection nodes increase resistance to kinetic damage, at the cost of overall shield strength.

special_shield_toughened.name: Double Braced
special_shield_toughened.description: Additional, hardened supports and bracing further improve module survivability.

special_shield_lightweight.name: Stripped Down
special_shield_lightweight.description: Key components replaced with versions crafted from lightweight materials and all extraneous parts removed entirely to reduce mass.

special_engine_cooled.name: Thermal Spread
special_engine_cooled.description: Additional thermal conduits and radiator solutions integrated across the module help balance thermal load increase cooling potential at the cost of slight mass increase

special_engine_haulage.name: Drive Distributors
special_engine_haulage.description: Enhanced fuel and thrust balancing across the drives to improve mass curve efficiency.

special_engine_overloaded.name: Drag Drives
special_engine_overloaded.description: Removal of safety protocols in controller software to increase drive thrust output at the cost of additional heat generation.

special_engine_toughened.name: Double Braced
special_engine_toughened.description: Additional, hardened supports and bracing further improve module survivability.

special_engine_lightweight.name: Stripped Down
special_engine_lightweight.description: Key components replaced with versions crafted from lightweight materials and all extraneous parts removed entirely to reduce mass.

special_fsd_fuelcapacity.name: Deep Charge
special_fsd_fuelcapacity.description: Toughened FSD power conduits and a reinforced charging field increase the amount of fuel injected when charging, allowing larger jumps at the cost of increased power draw.

special_fsd_heavy.name: Mass Manager
special_fsd_heavy.description: Complex software upgrade and internal sensor suite able to optimise frame shift operation by analysing and accounting for ship loadout. Increases optimised mass at the cost of module health.

special_fsd_toughened.name: Double Braced
special_fsd_toughened.description: Additional, hardened supports and bracing further improve module survivability.

special_fsd_lightweight.name: Stripped Down
special_fsd_lightweight.description: Key components replaced with versions crafted from lightweight materials and all extraneous parts removed entirely to reduce mass.

special_fsd_cooled.name: Thermal Spread
special_fsd_cooled.description: Additional thermal conduits and radiator solutions integrated across the module help balance thermal load increase cooling potential.

special_powerplant_highcharge.name: Monstered
special_powerplant_highcharge.description: Oversized, reinforced components increase power output at the cost of increased mass.

special_powerplant_cooled.name: Thermal Spread
special_powerplant_cooled.description: Additional thermal conduits and radiator solutions integrated across the module help balance thermal load increase cooling potential.

special_powerplant_toughened.name: Double Braced
special_powerplant_toughened.description: Additional, hardened supports and bracing further improve module survivability.

special_powerplant_lightweight.name: Stripped Down
special_powerplant_lightweight.description: Key components replaced with versions crafted from lightweight materials and all extraneous parts removed entirely to reduce mass.

special_powerdistributor_capacity.name: Cluster Capacitors
special_powerdistributor_capacity.description: Additional capacitor arrays allow the power distributor to store more energy at the cost of a slower charging rate.

special_powerdistributor_fast.name: Super Conduits
special_powerdistributor_fast.description: Advanced, oversized energy conduits increase the power distributor's charge rate at the cost of reduced maximum charge potential.

special_powerdistributor_efficient.name: Flow Control
special_powerdistributor_efficient.description: Advanced software and internal sensors regulate energy flow more efficiently, reducing module power draw.

special_powerdistributor_toughened.name: Double Braced
special_powerdistributor_toughened.description: Additional, hardened supports and bracing further improve module survivability.

special_powerdistributor_lightweight.name: Stripped Down
special_powerdistributor_lightweight.description: Key components replaced with versions crafted from lightweight materials and all extraneous parts removed entirely to reduce mass.

special_shieldcell_gradual.name: Recycling Cell
special_shieldcell_gradual.description: Uprated resonating coils maximise the amount of time the shield cell can remain active before depleting, at the cost of overall strength of the cell charge.

special_shieldcell_oversized.name: Boss Cells
special_shieldcell_oversized.description: Oversized cells offer increased cell strength at cost of an increased spin up time.

special_shieldcell_efficient.name: Flow Control
special_shieldcell_efficient.description: Advanced software and internal sensors regulate energy flow more efficiently, reducing module power draw.

special_shieldcell_toughened.name: Double Braced
special_shieldcell_toughened.description: Additional, hardened supports and bracing further improve module survivability.

special_shieldcell_lightweight.name: Stripped Down
special_shieldcell_lightweight.description: Key components replaced with versions crafted from lightweight materials and all extraneous parts removed entirely to reduce mass.

special_weapon_damage.name: Oversized
special_weapon_damage.description: Scaled up components and reinforced munitions housing allows the weapon to pack more of a punch, increasing damage at the cost of increased power draw.

special_weapon_rateoffire.name: Multi-servos
special_weapon_rateoffire.description: Additional servomechanisms and controller software allow the weapon to safely fire at an increased rate, at the cost of increased power draw.

special_weapon_efficient.name: Flow Control
special_weapon_efficient.description: Advanced software and internal sensors regulate energy flow more efficiently, reducing module power draw.

special_weapon_toughened.name: Double Braced
special_weapon_toughened.description: Additional, hardened supports and bracing further improve module survivability.

special_weapon_lightweight.name: Stripped Down
special_weapon_lightweight.description: Key components replaced with versions crafted from lightweight materials and all extraneous parts removed entirely to reduce mass.

special_armour_thermic.name: Reflective Plating
special_armour_thermic.description: Surface coating of advanced formulas designed to reflect and dissipate thermal energy, at the cost of structural integrity.

special_armour_kinetic.name: Angled Plating
special_armour_kinetic.description: Custom angling of plates at critical points along the ship's hull make projectile strikes more likely to glance, reducing the impact of kinetic damage at the cost of structural integrity.

special_armour_explosive.name: Layered Plating
special_armour_explosive.description: Layers of advanced inert lining material within the ship's plating absorb and redistribute the force from explosive attacks, reducing damage of this type at the cost of overall structural integrity.

special_armour_chunky.name: Deep Plating
special_armour_chunky.description: Increased depth of plating increases the ship's overall structural integrity, at the cost of resistance against all types of damage.

special_hullreinforcement_thermic.name: Reflective Plating
special_hullreinforcement_thermic.description: Surface coating of advanced formulas designed to reflect and dissipate thermal energy, at the cost of reducing structural integrity benefits.

special_hullreinforcement_kinetic.name: Angled Plating
special_hullreinforcement_kinetic.description: Custom angling of plates at critical points along the ship's hull make projectile strikes more likely to glance, reducing the impact of kinetic damage at the cost of reducing structural integrity benefits.

special_hullreinforcement_explosive.name: Layered Plating
special_hullreinforcement_explosive.description: Layers of advanced inert lining material within the ship's plating absorb and redistribute the force from explosive attacks, reducing damage of this type at the cost of reducing structural integrity benefits.

special_hullreinforcement_chunky.name: Deep Plating
special_hullreinforcement_chunky.description: Increased depth of plating increases the ship's overall structural integrity, at the cost of resistance against all types of damage.

special_shieldbooster_thermic.name: Thermo Block
special_shieldbooster_thermic.description: Improved feedback protection and reinforced projection nodes increase resistance to thermal damage, at the cost of overall shield strength.

special_shieldbooster_kinetic.name: Force Block
special_shieldbooster_kinetic.description: Enlarged projection nodes increase resistance to kinetic damage, at the cost of overall shield strength.

special_shieldbooster_explosive.name: Blast Block
special_shieldbooster_explosive.description: Advanced field resonation patterns increase resistance to explosive damage, at the cost of overall shield strength.

special_shieldbooster_efficient.name: Flow Control
special_shieldbooster_efficient.description: Advanced software and internal sensors regulate energy flow more efficiently, reducing module power draw.

special_shieldbooster_toughened.name: Double Braced
special_shieldbooster_toughened.description: Additional, hardened supports and bracing further improve module survivability.

special_shieldbooster_chunky.name: Super Capacitors
special_shieldbooster_chunky.description: Additional, advanced capacitors increases overall shield strength at the cost of damage resistance.
